perks.name: Double Tap
perks.effect: Increases fire rate of all 'bullet' weapons by 33%, as well as Bouncing Betty speed.

perks.name: Speed Cola
perks.effect: Increases reload speed by 50 percent and massively increases the speed at which players can rebuild barriers.

perks.name: Stamina Up
perks.effect: Increases Sprint Endurance and Sprint Speed. Stamina also regenerates faster.

perks.name: PHD Flopper
perks.effect: Gives complete immunity to all explosive and falling damage, and dolphin diving now makes an explosion.

perks.name: Deadshot
perks.effect: Removes scope sway as well as reduces recoil and increases hip-fire accuracy. Additionally, this Perk will 'snap' the auto-aim sight to the Zombie's critical areas when ADS'ing rather than their torso.

perks.name: Mule Kick
perks.effect: Allows an additional weapon to be carried, for a total of three. The most recently purchased weapon will be lost when downed.
